Docs.summary: Utilities for various heuristics against text files. Currently, separator inference and column count detection.

Public Shared Function TrySplitColumns (env As IHostEnvironment, source As IMultiStreamSource, separatorCandidates As String(), Optional allowSparse As Nullable(Of Boolean) = null, Optional allowQuote As Nullable(Of Boolean) = null, Optional skipStrictValidation As Boolean = false) As TextFileContents.ColumnSplitResult

static member TrySplitColumns : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IMultiStreamSource * string[] * Nullable<bool> * Nullable<bool> * bool -> Microsoft.ML.Runtime.PipelineInference.TextFileContents.ColumnSplitResult

Docs.summary: Attempt to detect text loader arguments. The algorithm selects the first 'acceptable' set: the one that recognizes the same number of columns in at least of the sample's lines, and this number of columns is more than 1. We sweep on separator, allow sparse and allow quote parameter.
